name: GreaseBoss
headline: GreaseBoss verifes industrial machinery is greased correctly
description:
Our hardware and software product verifies industrial machines are greased correctly. 

Incorrect greasing is the number one cause for machinery failure and costs $21bn per annum.

founders.name: Peter Condoleon, Founder
founders.description: Peter is the co-founder and CTO of GreaseBoss, a company with a vision to transform the way industries manage lubrication for heavy machinery. In his role as CTO, Peter drives the ongoing innovation and development of GreaseBoss technology, employing cutting-edge solutions to solve an age old problem.

founders.name: Tim Hall, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
Tim's entrepreneurial spirit and strategic foresight sees him actively developing business opportunities and building partnerships whilst constantly pushing the possibilities of what is achievable with the resources at hand.  
He is focussed and tenacious on overcoming issues and delivering on technical projects.  As an experienced project manager with a mechanical engineering background, he has the business, technical and people skills to deliver on business outcomes.

# Greaseboss verifies your machinery is greased correctly
Right Grease, Right Amount, Right Time, Every Time
[Play VideoWatch 2min Demo Video](https://www.greaseboss.com.au/<https:/vimeo.com/825673499>)
BOOK A 15MIN DEMO MEETING
### Leading the Digital Transformation of Greasing
GreaseBoss gives your people the right data to do their jobs effectively and eliminate the risk of incorrect greasing. Our system is simple to use and can be easily retrofitted into existing industrial equipment and grease delivery systems.
**Why Greaseboss?**
  * **Prevent avoidable breakdowns**
  * **Gain visibility for greasing – automatic and manual**


  * **Remotely monitor multiple sites**
  * **Systemise greasing for high staff turnover**


## How does the greaseboss system work?
[Learn More ](https://www.greaseboss.com.au/<https:/greaseboss.com.au/how-does-greaseboss-work/>)
![](https://greaseboss.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/220125-12-COV02691_GreaseBoss_cleanup.png)
### About Greaseboss
Founded on the Sunshine Coast, Australia, our story begins in the mining industry where founders Tim, and Pete recognised a gap in innovative lubrication products and systems needed to address some of the biggest and most costly issues for operations.
[Learn More ](https://www.greaseboss.com.au/<https:/greaseboss.com.au/about-greaseboss/>)
#### LUBRICATE WITH CONFIDENCE
GreaseBoss is the first to market with a suite of tools that digitally transform the task of greasing Industrial equipment. GreaseBoss has made greasing safer, more reliable and more productive than anything on the market before us. 
**BOOK A DEMO**
Book your 15min live demonstration video call with the GreaseBoss team.
Book a demo

generated_description:
### GreaseBoss: Ensuring Machinery Reliability Through Smart Greasing

**Overview**  
Founded in 2020 and hailing from the Sunshine Coast, Australia, GreaseBoss is tackling one of the most significant pain points in industrial machinery maintenance—incorrect greasing. This oversight isn't trivial; it’s the leading cause of machinery failure, resulting in a staggering $21 billion in losses annually. 

**Mission**  
GreaseBoss aims to verify that industrial machinery is greased correctly, all the time. Their solution combines hardware and software to monitor and ensure that the right grease is applied in the right amount and at the right time.

**Product Offering**  
GreaseBoss has developed a cutting-edge system that is not only user-friendly but also easily retrofittable into existing industrial equipment and greasing systems. The technology provides industries with the right data to prevent avoidable breakdowns, enabling remote monitoring and systematic greasing practices that help maintain operations through staff turnover.

**Market Position**  
GreaseBoss distinguishes itself as the first to market with comprehensive tools that digitally transform industrial greasing. Their innovative approach has revolutionized how businesses handle lubrication, making processes safer, more reliable, and productive.

**Team and Support**  
The company is comprised of a dedicated team of 10 employees and is part of Y Combinator's Batch W21 incubator, giving them strong backing and resources. Their unique value proposition is enhanced by partnerships, notably with Nan—a recognized group partner.

**Target Sectors**  
GreaseBoss primarily serves sectors like mining, metals, utilities, and asphalt plants, addressing critical needs in these high-demand areas for precise lubrication solutions.

**Call to Action**  
If you’re in an industry where machinery uptime is crucial, consider booking a demo to see how GreaseBoss can transform your greasing practices and prevent costly breakdowns. Visit their website [GreaseBoss](https://www.greaseboss.com.au) for more information and to explore their offerings.
